codeString: assert(a===undefined, 'a is undefined');var a = 5;assert(a!==undefined, 'a is not undefined')

content.heading: function declaration
content.contentMD:
## Different types of function declaration

three types of function declaration

codeString: var x = 'outer';function test(inner) {if (inner) {var x = 'inner';return x;}return x;}assert(test(false) === undefined, 'it should return undefined as var declaration are hoisted');assert(test(true) === 'inner', 'will get redefined.')

content.heading: Hoisting of variable declaration with var
content.contentMD: declaration with var are hoisted, so inner x will move to top of the function body.
